name: Cake Maker Deluxe (itch)
description:
A simple game about making a cake.  There is a four step process:

  • Find an egg.  Make sure it's a good egg.
  • Harvest wheat.  Harvest 10 wheat at a time.  If one is not good, you must restart the whole cake.
  • Gather milk.  Keep the cow safe so that it can produce milk.  If the cow is compromised, you must restart the cake.
  • Bake the cake.  Be careful not to over or undercook the cake.  If the cake is not properly cooked you must restart the cake.

This game is easy. Video games should be easy, so this one is a piece of cake.
